name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-activity-feed-broadcast-nodejs
title: Broadcast message to organization using activity feed notification (Graph APIs)
shortDescription: This sample allows users to broadcast messages to all organization members via Teams activity feed notifications using Graph APIs.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to send broadcast messages to all organization members through Microsoft Teams' activity feed using Graph APIs. It includes Teams SSO, Graph API integration, and activity feed notifications for seamless communication.
